accountAggregator.mainSelect: SELECT a.cflg9, --0 a.acdan, --1 a.indprog, --2 a.delprog, --3 a.apers, --4 a.acatc, --5 a.spaz, --6 a.arags, --7 dec_ezawe2(a.delprog,k.stato,a.mercato_versione,a.delabi) AS ezawe, --8 dec_ikey(a.acatc) AS ikey, --9 dec_togru(a.acatc) AS togru, --10 a.ktokl, --11 a.mahnv, --12 CASE WHEN dec_ezawe2(a.delprog,k.stato,a.mercato_versione,a.delabi) = 'P' THEN 'A' WHEN dec_ezawe2(a.delprog,k.stato,a.mercato_versione,a.delabi) = 'R' THEN 'C' WHEN dec_ezawe2(a.delprog,k.stato,a.mercato_versione,a.delabi) = 'T' THEN 'C' WHEN dec_ezawe2(a.delprog,k.stato,a.mercato_versione,a.delabi) = 'S' THEN 'C' ELSE 'C' END AS azawe , --13 CASE WHEN dec_ezawe2(a.delprog,k.stato,a.mercato_versione,a.delabi) IN ('R','F','T','S') THEN a.delprog ELSE '' END AS ABVTY_EXT, --14 a.ausgrup_in--15 FROM ( SELECT cflg9, --0 a.acdan, --1 indprog, --2 a.delprog, --3 apers, --4 acatc, --5 ' ' AS spaz, --6 SUBSTR(arags, 0, 35) AS arags, dec_ktokl(cserv, acatc) AS ktokl, --11 dec_mahnv(cserv, acatc) AS mahnv, dec_ausgrup_in(segmento_cliente_sap, cserv) AS ausgrup_in,--15 b.delabi, a.mercato_versione FROM v_contratti2 a LEFT OUTER JOIN dbi_user.ifc_sap_anagrbanche b ON ( cflg9 = delef AND a.delprog = b.delprog), dbi_user.ifc_sap_anagrindirizzi i, z_pr_in_lavorazione pr WHERE a.cflg9 = i.indcli AND a.acdan IN ( SELECT legacy FROM partner_but020) AND a.cncon = pr.cncon GROUP BY cflg9, --0 a.acdan, --1 indprog, --2 a.delprog, --3 apers, --4 acatc, --5 ' ', --6 SUBSTR(arags, 0, 35) , --7 dec_ktokl(cserv, acatc) , --11 dec_mahnv(cserv, acatc) , --12 dec_ausgrup_in(segmento_cliente_sap, cserv),--15 b.delabi, a.mercato_versione ) a LEFT OUTER JOIN dbi_user.IFC_SAP_ANAGRCLIENTIFACTOR k ON k.acdan = a.acdan ORDER BY a.cflg9, a.acdan, a.indprog DESC, a.delprog

accountExtractor.mainSelect: select a.legacy, a.tipo, a.gpart, a.vktyp, a.vkona, b.legacy, b.tipo, b.vkbez, c.legacy, c.tipo, c.partner, c.exvko, c.opbuk, c.ezawe, c.azawe, c.ikey, c.mahnv, c.vkpbz, c.togru, c.adrnb_ext, c.zahlkond, c.vertyp, c.kofiz_sd, c.ktokl, c.formkey, c.ausgrup_in, c.kzabsver, c.ebvty_ext, c.abvty_ext, c.fityp, c.sendcontrol_rh, c.stdbk, c.zzrichrid from account_init a, account_vk b, account_vkp c where a.legacy = b.legacy and a.legacy = c.legacy order by a.legacy
